sense.name: commercial or business enterprise
sense.examples: Government and industry need to cooperate on this issue. He worked twenty years in the film industry. Much of the steel industry has gone overseas.

sense.name: diligence or determination
sense.commentary: INDUSTRY[+quality][+purposive] (Note: used as an attribute of a person or activity)
sense.examples: The child showed great industry in building a castle with the colored blocks. You might enjoy your job more if you'd put more industry into the daily tasks.
